name: Cat Got Your Tongue? (Tsionsa)
description:
you play as a bored worker ,stuck in the rat race. waiting endlessly for something mildly interesting to happen.

until one day, when your wish finally came trough, it wasn't what you were expecting, to say the least.

your tongue got cut off

you have to get it back.

for tongue related reasons

****don't  press the fullscreen button!!! if you wanna actually play the game that is.****
